questions.question: Where should 'hi there' be placed in the README?
options: At the very beginning as the first line (before the logo)
After the title '# Posthog JS' and before the description
As part of or within the existing description paragraph

questions.question: Should 'hi there' be formatted as plain text or as a Markdown element?
options: As emphasized text (e.g., *hi there* or **hi there**)

questions.question: Is 'hi there' meant to be a greeting/welcome message or does it have a specific functional purpose?
options: A casual greeting/welcome message for users
Part of the project description or tagline
A reference or inside joke related to the project

answers.selectedOption: At the very beginning as the first line (before the logo)
A casual greeting/welcome message for users
